飜字的基本解释

飜
fān
同“翻”。

飜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fān］
同“翻1”。
(1)飞。
(2)反转；歪倒。
(3)反而，相反地。
(4)谱写。

飜字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【飛字部】　飜； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1415第25
【廣韻】【集韻】?孚袁切，音旛。【玉篇】飛也。【王粲·贈蔡子篤詩】苟非鴻雕，孰能飛飜。雖則進慕，予思罔宣。　又水之溢洄曰飜，見【劉績·管子註】。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fān］
Same as "turn 1".
(1) Fly.
(2) Reverse; crooked.
(3) On the contrary, on the contrary.
(4) Compose.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Xujixia】【Feizi Department】　飜; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1415 to 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fu Yuan Qi, sound streamers. [Jade articles] Feiye. [Wang Can·Gift to Cai Zidu Poems] Gou is a Hongdiao, who can fly. Although it is admired, I think it is unreasonable.　The overflowing of water again said 飜, see [Liu Ji·Guan Zi Note].
